name: ufc_fight_night_vettori_vs_cannonier_june_17_2023
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mma_stats.
Tool description: The MMA Stats API can be used to retrieve information about UFC  fighters Statistics ,previous & upcoming fights, or to search for past fights involving specific fighters.
API description: **UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Cannonier**.                                                          
 Access a range of information about each fighter, including their win-loss record, height, weight, reach, and age. results of a particular fight or a fighter's win-loss record.

offset.description: The starting point for the range of data to fetch. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to fetch. Defaults to None.
